summary: Model replacement for Spellbreaker with the Shield of Ysgramor
descriptionHtml:
For those true nords out there who don\'t want to be using poxy Dwemer looking armor, but still like Spellbreaker. A simple mod which replaces Spellbreakers appearance with that of the Shield of Ysgramor. The Ysgramor shield retains the special effect which was inherent to Spellbreaker.. Now go and conquer Skyrim Milk drinker!

Installation - Open SpellYsgramor.rar and move the folder to your /Skyrim/Data/ directory..
Uninstall - Remove folder SpellBreaker in (Skyrim/data/meshes/armor)
author: Zodd13
